Name: Idle Campaign
About the game: Explore through Idle Campaign ! A DnD-inspired idle/incremental game about slaughtering enemies with a group of heroes. No rebirth! Continue forward without the need to rebirth and repeat the same levels. Battle with three hero pieces! Craft armor, upgrade the armor, and gain crafting levels. Spend gold to gain upgrades in the Trainer window. Spend skill points and advanced skill points to power up. Unlock Specialty & Ability points to increase unique ability powers for each hero piece. Find Ritual Candles & Magic pouches to get special bonuses through the Reliquary. Trade in Ethereal Keys for Ethereal Chests to get rewards. Climb the leaderboards! Find collectibles to finish Tasks! Explore unique zones during your campaigns. Do daily quests, and claim daily login rewards. Use the spinning wheel to earn fun bonuses. And More! Do your hero pieces proud and see how far you can make it through your campaign!
